alert.note: Alert for Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:38PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Logan, northeastern Scott and west central Yell Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 238 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cardiff, or 8 miles south of Booneville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mount Magazine... Sugar Grove... Grayson... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Southern and Eastern Logan County
